review:
Dr. Nagamalesh Sir is a very noble person, it is because of his help that my dad got his heart transplantation done successfully at MS Ramaiah Narayana Hrudayala. He takes utmost care of his patients giving confidence to the patients & relatives. My dad is currently recovering well thanks to the Dr. Nagamalesh Sir. I would definitely recommend consulting Dr. Nagamalesh Sir if you are having any heart related ailment.

Thank you Sir for all your help.
*** ********** ** *** ** *** ****** ******** very good human being and a brilliant cardiologist. He treated my father. I have recommended him for many.

Dr. Nagamalesh is a great cardiologist. He has saved my father who had an heart attack. After the procedure he explained all the details with patience. I really appreciate his effort and strongly recommend him to everyone I know.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I STRONGLY RECOMMEND DOCTOR FOR HIS FULL CO-OPERATION AND TIMELY SUPPORT. AND HE GIVES FULL CONFIDENCE AND HE HIS VERY FRIENDLY AND LIKE OUR FAMILY MEMBERS HE WILL TREAT THE PATIENTS.
****** **** ****  **** ******

I would highly recommend Dr. Nagamalesh. Gives a patient hearing to your concerns and is easily approachable. I had met him for an opinion on a cardiac issue, and his reassurance and advice eased my mind and helped me decide the next course of action.

Doctor is very nice and cooperative.
He is good listener and then only he will suggest you future.
But now he is sitting in Aster CMI
